attributes.action: promote a lasting solution to the Cyprus problem based on the right of return of all refugees to their homes and the repatriation of illegal settlers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Much of Cyprus has been illegally occupied by the Turkish army since 1974. Turkey has installed a puppet regime in the north of the island, has  shipped in tens of thousands of illegal settlers and has also refused to give an account of the fate of 1619 people missing since it invaded.
Any solution must include within it a recognition of the right of return of all refugees to their homes and the humane repatriation of the illegal settlers.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "promote a lasting solution to the Cyprus problem based on the right of return of all refugees to their homes and the repatriation of illegal settlers."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page12022.asp

Prime Minister's Office
